definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: blow (NH = BH; Targum [[נְשַׁב]] (but also [[נְחַב]]), Syr. n4ab, all blow; ‖ form of [[נׇשַׁף]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[נׇֽשְׁבָה בּוֹ]] ´[[רוּחַ י]] Is 40:7 the breath of ´[[י]] has blown upon it.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יַשֵּׁב רוּחַ]] Ps 147:18 he causes his wind to blow; [[וַיַּשֵּׁב אׂתָם]] Ge 15:11 and he drove them away (perh. orig. blow away, drive away by blowing, or by a sound like blowing).
